credit_line: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
title: Portrait of Stalin
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Circular; painted in the center with a portrait of Joseph Stalin; a blue border edged by gilded leaf bands and with the inscription (in Russian) "To Joseph Vissarionovich Stalin, The Creator of Great Victories"
name: Plate
